location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 134 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses several administrative and financial matters including sales of cloth. The letter states that monthly accounts for November and December are enclosed (they are not contained in the file) and the debt owed to the Resident by the company is mentioned.
